1â†’# Trivivo Project Review
     2â†’
     3â†’> Generated: 2026-02-11
     4â†’
     5â†’---
     6â†’
     7â†’## Architecture â€” 6.5/10
     8â†’
     9â†’**Strengths**
    10â†’- Clean 3-app structure (`game`, `auth`, `adminpanel`) with well-defined boundaries
    11â†’- `django-configurations` for environment-based config (Base/Dev/Prod)
    12â†’- Tailwind CSS properly integrated via `django-tailwind`
    13â†’- Good use of `LoginRequiredMixin` + `UserPassesTestMixin` for authorization
    14â†’
    15â†’**Critical Issues**
    16â†’- `adminpanel` and `auth` are not registered in `INSTALLED_APPS` â€” will cause migration issues and app autodiscovery failures
    17â†’- No custom User model (`AUTH_USER_MODEL`). Extending auth later will require a painful data migration
    18â†’- `Session` model is a god-object: 19 fields, 6 FKs, 6 M2M relations â€” should be split into `GameSession`, `GameState`, `GameScore`
    19â†’- Session IDs are 8-char strings with manual collision detection (`get_unused_sessionId`). Use `UUIDField` instead
    20â†’- `Prod` settings class only sets `DEBUG = False` â€” no `ALLOWED_HOSTS`, no HTTPS settings, no logging
    21â†’- SQLite hardcoded for all environments; `dj-database-url` is installed but unused
    22â†’- `CSRF_EXEMPT` on `AddQuestion` API endpoint instead of proper token authentication
    23â†’
    24â†’**Scalability Risks**
    25â†’- No caching (`CACHES` not configured), no background worker (`celery` absent)
    26â†’- No API versioning â€” future breaking changes become painful
    27â†’- URL design encodes game state (`/game/<session>/question/<level>/`) â€” not RESTful
    28â†’
    29â†’---
    30â†’
    31â†’## Code Quality
    32â†’
    33â†’**Critical Bugs**
    34â†’- `game/views.py:120` â€” `sessionObj.delete()` called before `sessionObj` is assigned â†’ `NameError` crash when user submits rules form without the `agreed` checkbox
    35â†’- `auth/views.py:85` â€” Missing `return` before `redirect("admin_page")` for superusers â†’ authenticated non-superusers can still reach the admin login page (auth bypass)
    36â†’- `game/views.py:38` â€” `Question.objects.all()[345]` hardcoded index; crashes with `IndexError` if the DB has fewer than 346 questions
    37â†’- `adminpanel/views.py:970` â€” `request.headers["Authorization"].split().pop()` with no `KeyError` guard; crashes on any malformed API request
    38â†’
    39â†’**Moderate Issues**
    40â†’- Double-query antipattern repeated throughout: `filter(...).exists()` followed immediately by `.get(...)` â€” one query is wasted every time
    41â†’- Wildcard imports: `from game.models import *`, `from .lifelines import *` â€” pollutes namespace and hides dependencies
    42â†’- Magic numbers scattered: lifeline IDs `[2, 3, 4]` hardcoded at `game/views.py:71`; level time limits at lines 165â€“175; score penalty `//= 100` at line 325 with no comment
    43â†’- `QuestionInGame.context_creator()` is 88 lines; `AdminMainPage.context_creater()` is 122 lines â€” untestable complexity
    44â†’- `random.randint()` used in `audiencePoll()` while `secrets.choice()` used elsewhere â€” inconsistent randomness
    45â†’- `print(request.POST)` left in production code (`game/views.py:20`) â€” should be Django logging
    46â†’- `agreedToRules`, `gameOver` field names are camelCase on Django models â€” should be `agreed_to_rules`, `game_over`
    47â†’
    48â†’**Minor Issues**
    49â†’- No docstrings on any view class
    50â†’- Template option rendering uses 4 repeated `{% if option1 %}...{% endif %}` blocks instead of a loop
    51â†’- `auth/validate.py` password check only requires 1 non-digit character â€” effectively no complexity enforcement
    52â†’
    53â†’---
    54â†’
    55â†’## Tests â€” 0%
    56â†’
    57â†’**Current state:** All test files (`adminpanel/tests.py`, `auth/tests.py`, `game/tests.py`, `tests/unit/`, `tests/functional/`) are empty boilerplate. The testing infrastructure (pytest, conftest.py, pytest-cov) is configured correctly but never used.
    58â†’
    59â†’**Bugs surfaced through code-reading (not yet tested)**
    60â†’- `game/models.py:247` â€” `random.choice(desirable_questions)` raises `IndexError` when no questions of the required difficulty exist
    61â†’- `game/views.py:366` â€” `sessionObj.score //= 100` uses integer division, silently truncating scores (e.g., score of 50 becomes 0)
    62â†’
    63â†’**Priority test gaps**
    64â†’
    65â†’| Area | Missing Tests |
    66â†’|---|---|
    67â†’| Auth validation | All functions in `auth/validate.py` (password length, non-numeric, username-not-in-password) |
    68â†’| Auth flows | Register, login, logout, admin login, duplicate username, missing fields |
    69â†’| Session management | Session creation, unique ID generation, `get_next_question()` by difficulty, deduplication |
    70â†’| Game logic | Correct/incorrect answer scoring, integer division bug, level progression to 16 |
    71â†’| Lifelines | 50-50 returns correct + 1 incorrect; lifeline moved from `left_lifelines` â†’ `used_lifelines` |
    72â†’| Admin API | `AddQuestion` valid payload, missing fields, non-list payload, wrong incorrect-answer count |
    73â†’| Access control | Superuser-only enforcement on every admin view |
    74â†’| Model methods | `get_default_pk()`, `get_sentinel_user()`, `get_unused_sessionId()` |
    75â†’
    76â†’**Recommended priority order:** auth validation â†’ auth flows â†’ session/game logic â†’ lifelines â†’ admin API â†’ model methods â†’ integration flows
    77â†’
    78â†’---
    79â†’
    80â†’## Performance
    81â†’
    82â†’**Critical (200â€“300+ queries per dashboard load)**
    83â†’- `adminpanel/views.py:119` â€” `AdminMainPage.context_creater()` calls `x.all_questions.all().count()` inside a `map()` over all categories â†’ N queries per category
    84â†’- `adminpanel/views.py:172` â€” `User.objects.all()` called twice; inner list calls `.initiated_sessions.all().count()` per user â†’ 1,001+ queries with 1,000 users
    85â†’- `adminpanel/views.py:143` â€” Daily chart loop (16 days Ã— 6+ queries each = 96+ queries)
    86â†’- `game/views.py:558` â€” Scoreboard iterates sessions calling `ses.correct_qns.all().count()` and `ses.used_lifelines.all().count()` per row â†’ 2N queries
    87â†’
    88â†’**Critical (memory / algorithmic)**
    89â†’- `game/models.py:234` â€” `get_next_question()` loads the entire questions table and all asked questions into Python memory, then does an in-memory set difference â€” O(n) memory, O(nÂ²) worst-case
    90â†’- `adminpanel/views.py:763` â€” `random.sample(list(Question.objects.all()), count)` loads the full table to pick 5 rows
    91â†’
    92â†’**Missing indexes** on every commonly filtered/sorted field:
    93â†’
    94â†’```
    95â†’Question.difficulty       â† filtered on every question fetch
    96â†’QuestionOrder.date_chosen â† filtered in chart queries
    97â†’Session.date_created      â† sorted/filtered in leaderboard + chart
    98â†’Session.session_user      â† filtered in scoreboard
    99â†’```
   100â†’
   101â†’**Other issues**
   102â†’- `templates/base.html` loads jQuery **twice** from two different CDNs (3.6.4 + 3.7.1)
   103â†’- No `CACHES` configuration â€” Django silently falls back to per-process `LocMemCache`, useless in multi-process deploys
   104â†’- `CONN_MAX_AGE` not set â€” new DB connections created more frequently than necessary
   105â†’- `tailwind.config.js:36` scans `../../**/*.js` which includes `node_modules/`
   106â†’
   107â†’**Quick wins (highest impact / lowest effort)**
   108â†’1. Replace the `context_creater()` loops with `annotate(Count(...))` â†’ fixes the worst N+1

# Trivivo Project Review

> Generated: 2026-02-11

---

## Architecture â€” 6.5/10

**Strengths**
- Clean 3-app structure (`game`, `auth`, `adminpanel`) with well-defined boundaries
- `django-configurations` for environment-based config (Base/Dev/Prod)
- Tailwind CSS properly integrated via `django-tailwind`
- Good use of `LoginRequiredMixin` + `UserPassesTestMixin` for authorization

**Critical Issues**
- `adminpanel` and `auth` are not registered in `INSTALLED_APPS` â€” will cause migration issues and app autodiscovery failures
- No custom User model (`AUTH_USER_MODEL`). Extending auth later will require a painful data migration
- `Session` model is a god-object: 19 fields, 6 FKs, 6 M2M relations â€” should be split into `GameSession`, `GameState`, `GameScore`
- Session IDs are 8-char strings with manual collision detection (`get_unused_sessionId`). Use `UUIDField` instead
- `Prod` settings class only sets `DEBUG = False` â€” no `ALLOWED_HOSTS`, no HTTPS settings, no logging
- SQLite hardcoded for all environments; `dj-database-url` is installed but unused
- `CSRF_EXEMPT` on `AddQuestion` API endpoint instead of proper token authentication

**Scalability Risks**
- No caching (`CACHES` not configured), no background worker (`celery` absent)
- No API versioning â€” future breaking changes become painful
- URL design encodes game state (`/game/<session>/question/<level>/`) â€” not RESTful

---

## Code Quality

**Critical Bugs**
- `game/views.py:120` â€” `sessionObj.delete()` called before `sessionObj` is assigned â†’ `NameError` crash when user submits rules form without the `agreed` checkbox
- `auth/views.py:85` â€” Missing `return` before `redirect("admin_page")` for superusers â†’ authenticated non-superusers can still reach the admin login page (auth bypass)
- `game/views.py:38` â€” `Question.objects.all()[345]` hardcoded index; crashes with `IndexError` if the DB has fewer than 346 questions
- `adminpanel/views.py:970` â€” `request.headers["Authorization"].split().pop()` with no `KeyError` guard; crashes on any malformed API request

**Moderate Issues**
- Double-query antipattern repeated throughout: `filter(...).exists()` followed immediately by `.get(...)` â€” one query is wasted every time
- Wildcard imports: `from game.models import *`, `from .lifelines import *` â€” pollutes namespace and hides dependencies
- Magic numbers scattered: lifeline IDs `[2, 3, 4]` hardcoded at `game/views.py:71`; level time limits at lines 165â€“175; score penalty `//= 100` at line 325 with no comment
- `QuestionInGame.context_creator()` is 88 lines; `AdminMainPage.context_creater()` is 122 lines â€” untestable complexity
- `random.randint()` used in `audiencePoll()` while `secrets.choice()` used elsewhere â€” inconsistent randomness
- `print(request.POST)` left in production code (`game/views.py:20`) â€” should be Django logging
- `agreedToRules`, `gameOver` field names are camelCase on Django models â€” should be `agreed_to_rules`, `game_over`

**Minor Issues**
- No docstrings on any view class
- Template option rendering uses 4 repeated `{% if option1 %}...{% endif %}` blocks instead of a loop
- `auth/validate.py` password check only requires 1 non-digit character â€” effectively no complexity enforcement

---

## Tests â€” 0%

**Current state:** All test files (`adminpanel/tests.py`, `auth/tests.py`, `game/tests.py`, `tests/unit/`, `tests/functional/`) are empty boilerplate. The testing infrastructure (pytest, conftest.py, pytest-cov) is configured correctly but never used.

**Bugs surfaced through code-reading (not yet tested)**
- `game/models.py:247` â€” `random.choice(desirable_questions)` raises `IndexError` when no questions of the required difficulty exist
- `game/views.py:366` â€” `sessionObj.score //= 100` uses integer division, silently truncating scores (e.g., score of 50 becomes 0)

**Priority test gaps**

| Area | Missing Tests |
|---|---|
| Auth validation | All functions in `auth/validate.py` (password length, non-numeric, username-not-in-password) |
| Auth flows | Register, login, logout, admin login, duplicate username, missing fields |
| Session management | Session creation, unique ID generation, `get_next_question()` by difficulty, deduplication |
| Game logic | Correct/incorrect answer scoring, integer division bug, level progression to 16 |
| Lifelines | 50-50 returns correct + 1 incorrect; lifeline moved from `left_lifelines` â†’ `used_lifelines` |
| Admin API | `AddQuestion` valid payload, missing fields, non-list payload, wrong incorrect-answer count |
| Access control | Superuser-only enforcement on every admin view |
| Model methods | `get_default_pk()`, `get_sentinel_user()`, `get_unused_sessionId()` |

**Recommended priority order:** auth validation â†’ auth flows â†’ session/game logic â†’ lifelines â†’ admin API â†’ model methods â†’ integration flows

---

## Performance

**Critical (200â€“300+ queries per dashboard load)**
- `adminpanel/views.py:119` â€” `AdminMainPage.context_creater()` calls `x.all_questions.all().count()` inside a `map()` over all categories â†’ N queries per category
- `adminpanel/views.py:172` â€” `User.objects.all()` called twice; inner list calls `.initiated_sessions.all().count()` per user â†’ 1,001+ queries with 1,000 users
- `adminpanel/views.py:143` â€” Daily chart loop (16 days Ã— 6+ queries each = 96+ queries)
- `game/views.py:558` â€” Scoreboard iterates sessions calling `ses.correct_qns.all().count()` and `ses.used_lifelines.all().count()` per row â†’ 2N queries

**Critical (memory / algorithmic)**
- `game/models.py:234` â€” `get_next_question()` loads the entire questions table and all asked questions into Python memory, then does an in-memory set difference â€” O(n) memory, O(nÂ²) worst-case
- `adminpanel/views.py:763` â€” `random.sample(list(Question.objects.all()), count)` loads the full table to pick 5 rows

**Missing indexes** on every commonly filtered/sorted field:

```
Question.difficulty       â† filtered on every question fetch
QuestionOrder.date_chosen â† filtered in chart queries
Session.date_created      â† sorted/filtered in leaderboard + chart
Session.session_user      â† filtered in scoreboard
```

**Other issues**
- `templates/base.html` loads jQuery **twice** from two different CDNs (3.6.4 + 3.7.1)
- No `CACHES` configuration â€” Django silently falls back to per-process `LocMemCache`, useless in multi-process deploys
- `CONN_MAX_AGE` not set â€” new DB connections created more frequently than necessary
- `tailwind.config.js:36` scans `../../**/*.js` which includes `node_modules/`

**Quick wins (highest impact / lowest effort)**
1. Replace the `context_creater()` loops with `annotate(Count(...))` â†’ fixes the worst N+1
2. Replace the question selection with a single filtered `.exclude(pk__in=...).order_by('?').first()` DB query
3. Add `db_index=True` to `Question.difficulty`, `Session.date_created`, `Session.session_user`
4. Remove the duplicate jQuery tag
5. Add `CONN_MAX_AGE = 600` to `DATABASES`

---

## Prioritized Action List

| Priority | Issue | Location |
|---|---|---|
| ğŸ”´ Immediate | `NameError` crash on rules form submit | `game/views.py:120` |
| ğŸ”´ Immediate | Missing `return` = auth bypass | `auth/views.py:85` |
| ğŸ”´ Immediate | Register apps in `INSTALLED_APPS` | `kbc/settings.py` |
| ğŸ”´ High | Add try/except around all `.get()` calls | `game/views.py`, `auth/views.py` |
| ğŸ”´ High | Fix dashboard N+1 (200+ queries â†’ 10) | `adminpanel/views.py:98â€“206` |
| ğŸ”´ High | Fix question selection memory issue | `game/models.py:234` |
| ğŸŸ¡ Medium | Add indexes on `difficulty`, `date_created`, `session_user` | `game/models.py` |
| ğŸŸ¡ Medium | Write auth + game logic tests | `tests/unit/` |
| ğŸŸ¡ Medium | Harden `Prod` settings (HTTPS, ALLOWED_HOSTS, logging) | `kbc/settings.py` |
| ğŸŸ¡ Medium | Replace string session ID with UUID | `game/models.py` |
| ğŸŸ¢ Later | Extract business logic into service layer | `game/services/` |
| ğŸŸ¢ Later | Add custom User model | `auth/models.py` |
| ğŸŸ¢ Later | Move to PostgreSQL via `dj-database-url` | `kbc/settings.py` |
| ğŸŸ¢ Later | Add Redis caching + `CONN_MAX_AGE` | `kbc/settings.py` |
| ğŸŸ¢ Later | RESTful URL redesign + API versioning | `kbc/urls.py`, `game/urls.py` |

content.text:
Here are 13 suggested labels based on what's documented across both reviews:

| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `bug` | Something is broken or behaving incorrectly |
| `critical` | Crash, data loss, or auth bypass risk |
| `security` | Vulnerability or exploitable behaviour |
| `performance` | Causes excess queries, memory, or latency |
| `frontend` | HTML / CSS / JavaScript issue |
| `backend` | Django / Python / view logic issue |
| `database` | Model, query, migration, or index issue |
| `auth` | Authentication or authorization related |
| `accessibility` | Breaks keyboard or screen reader access |
| `design-debt` | CSS inconsistency or unfinished migration |
| `tests` | Missing, empty, or broken test coverage |
| `refactor` | Restructure code without changing behaviour |
| `good-first-issue` | Low complexity, well-scoped for new contributors |

A few notes on the choices:
- `critical` stacks on top of `bug` for the crash/bypass class (BUG-02, auth bypass, `NameError`).
- `design-debt` covers the three-framework inconsistency and Tailwind migration leftovers â€” distinct from `refactor` which is for Python/view code.
- `database` is worth separating from `backend` given the N+1, missing indexes, and model design issues throughout.
- `good-first-issue` fits things like BUG-17 (forgot password stub), BUG-18 (copyright year), BUG-20 (currency spacing).

# Trivivo
"Trivivo" is a website developed by me that aims to test you with 15 questions of varying difficulty and topics, with staggering timeouts. The aim is to score the highest among the quiz-takers! ## Trello The Trello board is [here](https://trello.com/b/r301JdtS/trivivo). ## Project Structure ```text . â”œâ”€â”€ adminpanel â”œâ”€â”€ auth â”œâ”€â”€ game â”œâ”€â”€ kbc â”œâ”€â”€ static â””â”€â”€ templates ``` - `adminpanel` app handles administrator actions of the app, allowing administrators to perform elevated actions such as CRUD operations, changing timeout speeds, etc. - `auth` app handles authentication of users/admins to various sites. - `game` app handles the game logic of the app, involving timeouts, progression to the next levels, score/leaderboard handling, etc. - `kbc` is the project folder (for Django projects). - `static` holds the staticfiles for the project & apps. - `templates` holds the templates for all the apps that get rendered when called via the `views.py` in each app.

## Issue Labels

### Quality & Documentation
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `accessibility` | Breaks keyboard or screen reader access |
| `design` | CSS inconsistency, unfinished migration, or design debt |
| `documentation` | Improvements or additions to documentation |

### Domain / Area
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `auth` | Authentication or authorization related |
| `backend` | Django / Python / view logic issue |
| `database` | Model, query, migration, or index issue |
| `frontend` | HTML / CSS / JavaScript issue |
| `performance` | Causes excess queries, memory, or latency |

### Issue Type
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `bug` | Something is broken or behaving incorrectly |
| `critical` | Crash, data loss, or auth bypass risk |
| `security` | Vulnerability or exploitable behaviour |
| `refactor` | Restructure code without changing behaviour |

### Engineering
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `infra` | CI/CD, GitHub Actions, or deployment configs |
| `tests` | Missing, empty, or broken test coverage |

### Workflow
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `release` | Marks PRs intended to be merged into main (production) |

### Contribution
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `enhancement` | New feature or request |
| `help wanted` | Extra attention is needed |

### Triage
| Label | Description |
|---|---|
| `duplicate` | This issue or pull request already exists |
| `good first issue` | Good for newcomers |
| `invalid` | This doesn't seem right |

# Trivivo
"Trivivo" is a website developed by me that aims to test you with 15 questions of varying difficulty and topics, with staggering timeouts. The aim is to score the highest among the quiz-takers! ## Trello The Trello board is [here](https://trello.com/b/r301JdtS/trivivo). ## Project Structure ```text . â”œâ”€â”€ adminpanel â”œâ”€â”€ auth â”œâ”€â”€ game â”œâ”€â”€ kbc â”œâ”€â”€ static â””â”€â”€ templates ``` - `adminpanel` app handles administrator actions of the app, allowing administrators to perform elevated actions such as CRUD operations, changing timeout speeds, etc. - `auth` app handles authentication of users/admins to various sites. - `game` app handles the game logic of the app, involving timeouts, progression to the next levels, score/leaderboard handling, etc. - `kbc` is the project folder (for Django projects). - `static` holds the staticfiles for the project & apps. - Done. The category names are now:

| Prefix | Category |
|---|---|
| `quality` | accessibility, design, documentation |
| `area` | auth, backend, database, frontend, performance |
| `type` | bug, critical, security, refactor |
| `dev` | infra, tests |
| `flow` | release |
| `contrib` | enhancement, help wanted |
| `triage` | duplicate, good first issue, invalid |

diff --git a/README.md b/README.md
index b191f4f..4658338 100644
--- a/README.md
+++ b/README.md
@@ -27,3 +27,53 @@ The Trello board is [here](https://trello.com/b/r301JdtS/trivivo).
 - `kbc` is the project folder (for Django projects).
 - `static` holds the staticfiles for the project & apps.
 - `templates` holds the templates for all the apps that get rendered when called via the `views.py` in each app.
+
+## Issue Labels
+
+### Quality
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `accessibility` | Breaks keyboard or screen reader access |
+| `design` | CSS inconsistency, unfinished migration, or design debt |
+| `documentation` | Improvements or additions to documentation |
+
+### Area
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `auth` | Authentication or authorization related |
+| `backend` | Django / Python / view logic issue |
+| `database` | Model, query, migration, or index issue |
+| `frontend` | HTML / CSS / JavaScript issue |
+| `performance` | Causes excess queries, memory, or latency |
+
+### Type
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `bug` | Something is broken or behaving incorrectly |
+| `critical` | Crash, data loss, or auth bypass risk |
+| `security` | Vulnerability or exploitable behaviour |
+| `refactor` | Restructure code without changing behaviour |
+
+### Dev
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `infra` | CI/CD, GitHub Actions, or deployment configs |
+| `tests` | Missing, empty, or broken test coverage |
+
+### Flow
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `release` | Marks PRs intended to be merged into main (production) |
+
+### Contribution
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `enhancement` | New feature or request |
+| `help wanted` | Extra attention is needed |
+
+### Triage
+| Label | Description |
+|---|---|
+| `duplicate` | This issue or pull request already exists |
+| `good first issue` | Good for newcomers |
+| `invalid` | This doesn't seem right |
